TopicTitle: KSP crashing on load, doesn't even show the Squad screen

Articles.Content:
I've got KSP 64-bit 1.1.2 on Win7 x64, and the following mod list: http://imgur.com/0y9x8xp

When I try to run the game, the KSP window appears on the taskbar for a moment, but then disappears and nothing else happens.  I don't even get the Squad loading screen.  My log file is here, can anyone point me as to what's causing this?

Log File:https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bx7P5dhGg6O4VXJhbnRjQm1SVGM/view?usp=sharing

Output Log: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0Bx7P5dhGg6O4U1ZLUmhidjhGV3M

Edited June 15, 2016 by tsaven

Just to diagnose the issue, have you tried running an unmodded game first?

Are you running KSP.exe or KSP_x64.exe?

What are your computer / operating system specs?

I'm running KSP_x64

It's Win7, 64-bit.  i5-4590, 16gb RAM, 960 GTX.

In that case, it's possible that you're crashing on load due to mod incompatibilities or having too many mods.

Have you tried an unmodded game first?

1 hour ago, sumghai said:

In that case, it's possible that you're crashing on load due to mod incompatibilities or having too many mods.

Have you tried an unmodded game first?

An unmodded install does work, and I don't doubt that it could be a mod that's causing this.  I'm hoping someone can help me pin down exactly which one; I've tried looking at the log files and it's all gibberish to me.

Unfortunately, having a large number of mods means it's difficult to pinpoint all possible interactions and potential incompatibilities.

You'll have to use a process of elimination by adding one mod at a time, and testing to see if the added mod causes the game to crash.
